snippet.title: Starlight Alliance Trailer #1
snippet.description:
On Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1544530/Starlight_Alliance/
Starlight Alliance is an Action RPG videogame with a science fiction setting inspired by Megaman Legends, Nier: Automata and other action-oriented jRPGs. It features fast combat with two controllable characters - one is player controlled, the other is AI controlled.

Find out why this futuristic version of earth is slowly falling apart alongside ex-cop Cyris and mechanic Lea. Discover dark secrets on earth's wasteland on the surface and explore the depths of space!
